summary.span: 代表控制項，這個控制項可讓使用者沿著 移動 控制項，來選取一段範圍的值。

span.span: Represents a control that lets the user select from a range of values by moving a control along a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項可讓使用者從某個範圍的值中選取值。A control lets users select a value from a range of values. 下圖顯示的範例控制項。The following illustration shows an example of a control. **滑桿控制項的範例****Example of a Slider Control** ![滑桿圖例](~/add/media/genericslider.png "滑桿圖例")![Slider illustration](~/add/media/genericslider.png "Slider illustration") 您可以自訂藉由設定其屬性的控制項。You can customize a control by setting its properties. 下列清單描述的一些特色，您可以自訂：The following list describes some of the attributes of a that you can customize: - 方向，水平或垂直。The orientation of the , either horizontal or vertical. - 刻度標記位置，沿著追蹤。The tick mark locations along the track. - 若要顯示的目前值的工具提示顯示。The display of tooltips to show the current value of the . - 能力至任一個嵌入式管理單元以刻度標記，或放置在任何時間點沿著。The ability of the to either snap to tick marks or to be positioned at any point along the . - 增加沿著值的方向。The direction of increasing value along the . 如需有關如何自訂控制項，請參閱個別成員。For more information about how to customize a control, see the individual member. 覆寫的中繼資料屬性，並設定其預設值為 10。 overrides the metadata of the property and sets its default to 10. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果值會顯示動畫，使用者可能不再能夠與互動控制動畫完成之後。If the value of the is animated, the user may no longer be able to interact with the control after the animation finishes. 請參閱[如何： 設定屬性之後以動畫顯示使用分鏡腳本](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-set-a-property-after-animating-it-with-a-storyboard.md)選項的方式，您可以還原的使用者控制它以動畫顯示之後。See [How to: Set a Property After Animating It with a Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-set-a-property-after-animating-it-with-a-storyboard.md) for options of how you can restore user control of a after it is animated. ## 自訂滑桿控制項Customizing the Slider Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [Slider 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Slider Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只能影響該屬性是否都存在於控制項的預設範本，並設定使用。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺化屬性清單中的 「 變更視覺結構的控制項 」 一節[透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何繫結的屬性要的控制項。The following examples shows how to bind the property of a to the of a control. 下列範例會定義控制項，名為`RectangeHeight`可以具有介於 0 到 200 之間。The following example defines a control that is named `RectangeHeight` that can have a between 0 and 200. [!code-xaml[SliderwithDataBinding#Minimum](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SliderwithDataBinding/CS/Pane1.xaml#minimum)] 下列範例示範如何定義繫結其屬性設的控制項。The following example shows how to define a that binds its property to the of the control. (在完整的範例中，為建立類似的繫結屬性。)(In the complete sample, a similar binding is created for the property.) [!code-xaml[SliderwithDataBinding#BindingRectangle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SliderwithDataBinding/CS/Pane1.xaml#bindingrectangle)]

summary.span: 取得或設定工具提示中 的 之小數點右邊所顯示的位數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of digits that are displayed to the right side of the decimal point for the of the in a tooltip.

value.span: 在工具提示中顯示之 的有效位數，指定為小數點右邊所顯示的位數。

span.span: The precision of the that displays in the tooltip, specified as the number of digits that appear to the right of the decimal point.
The default is zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值必須為非負整數。The value of this property must be a non-negative integer. 如果這個屬性設定為非負數整數以外的值，就會發生例外狀況。If this property is set to a value other than a non-negative integer, an exception occurs. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. summary.span: 取得或設定增加值的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction of increasing value.

value.span: 如果增加值的方向是向左 (水平滑桿) 或向下 (垂直滑桿)，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the direction of increasing value is to the left for a horizontal slider or down for a vertical slider; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值決定方向的值會增加。The value of this property determines the direction of increasing value of a . 比方說，當您移動控制向上垂直時屬性設定為`false`，則的會增加。For example, when you move the control up on a vertical when the property is set to `false`, the of the increases. 如果值屬性變更為`true`，則的隨著減少向上移動。If the value of the property is changed to `true`, the of the decreases as the moves up. 這個屬性會繫結至屬性它所實作的控制項。This property binds to the property for the control that it implements. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示當滑鼠指標停留在 軌跡上方時， 的 是否會立即移至滑鼠點選位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the of a moves immediately to the location of the mouse click that occurs while the mouse pointer pauses on the track.

value.span: 如果 會立即移至滑鼠點選位置，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the moves immediately to the location of a mouse click; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`false`並按下滑鼠，就會發生沿著離開，則按一下滑鼠的方向移動。When this property is set to `false` and a mouse click occurs along the away from the , the moves in the direction of the mouse click. 而不需要立即為移動的滑鼠點選位置移動的距離會由此按一下的每個滑鼠。Instead of moving immediately to the mouse click location, the moves a distance that is defined by the property for each mouse click. 按住滑鼠左鍵，直到可模擬多個滑鼠點按的效果重新置放以想要的位置。The effect of multiple mouse clicks can be emulated by pressing and holding the left mouse button until the is repositioned to the desired location. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#selectionrange)] [!code-vb[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#selectionrange)] [!code-xaml[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/xaml/window1.xaml#selectionrange)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並屬性定義的選取範圍，而且必須設定為時顯示的選取範圍設定為`true`。The and properties define a selection range and must be set for the selection range to appear when is set to `true`. 下圖顯示與定義的選取範圍。The following illustration shows a with a selection range defined. **定義的滑桿控制項的選取範圍****A selection range defined for a Slider control** ![Slider 的選取範圍](~/add/media/sliderselectionrange.GIF "Slider 的選取範圍")![Slider selection range](~/add/media/sliderselectionrange.GIF "Slider selection range") 這個屬性繫結至屬性它所實作的控制項。This property is bound to the property of the control that it implements. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. summary.span: 提供 已路由事件的類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`true`，此實作中移動滑鼠的位置按一下。When the property is `true`, this implementation moves the to the location of the mouse click. 此實作會將標示事件，為已處理，藉由設定屬性的事件資料，以`true`。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true`. 事件由處理這個方法讓所控制項的未處理的事件。The event is handled by this method so that the controls of the do not handle the event.

span.para: 如果您覆寫，務必呼叫基底實作，您實作。無法呼叫基底實作，可避免基底類別處理可能會變更執行階段行為的最後一個類別的類別處理常式的事件。您可以呼叫之前或之後，在特殊處理的基底實作，根據您的需求。

If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation. Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class. You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所定義的範圍以外的刻度和屬性值會被忽略。Tick marks that are outside the range that is defined by the and property values are ignored. 屬性必須設定為值以外的其他的刻度會出現。The property must be set to a value other than for tick marks to appear. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property.
